attributes.review: So racist, it barely works and it made my whole phone glitch. I want to make my phone great again and because of that this app has to go. I think that they have a firewall bigger then the Mexican wall and that’s why it won’t work. Plus the white supremacy is off the charts.and on Fourth of July I got a bunch of ads that said that all countries matter. This app needs a lot of fixing and growing just like trumps hair. Hope they make it better by removing the Cheeto puff off the front picture oops that’s just Donald. Maybe they should give everyone an extra $1200 to make up for the bad work that this app delivers.
